ValidationRule.description: Goodwill Claim Amount mus be greater than 0.This validation rule only applies to Commercial and Residential Claims.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( !ISBLANK( GoodwillClaimAmount__c ), GoodwillClaimAmount__c < 1, OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Commercial_Claim', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Residential_Claim' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Goodwill Claim Ammount has to be more than zero.
